text:
Title: Freelance Writer, Freelance Editor Education: University of Southern Mississippi, Northwestern University Location: New York, New York Expertise: Pregnancy, Parenting, Health

Bonnie Gibbs Vengrow is a freelance writer and editor who creates content for Parents, other digital media, and various brands. She is also a senior content strategist at Aetna. Prior to her job at Aetna, Vengrow worked for Citi, iVillage, and Good Housekeeping.

Experience Bonnie Gibbs Vengrow is a strategic storyteller with over 20 years of experience. She has covered many parenting topics for Parents, including miscarriage, ways to celebrate grandparents day, and pregnancy symptoms. Some of her other clients include Movable Media, Today, The Bump, Hospital for Special Surgery, Indiana University Health, Prevention, Fit Pregnancy, and Good Housekeeping.

Education Bonnie Gibbs Vengrow studied journalism at the University of Southern Mississippi. She also has a master's degree in journalism from Northwestern University.
